email_response.subject: Re: OPPORTUNITY: Satellite Upgrade technicians needed in Chicago
email_response.body:
Hi!

Count me in for the satellite upgrade work.

Here's what I bring to the table:
- 2022 bucket truck with 55ft working height
- Spectrum analyzer (Keysight)
- Fiber fusion splicer (Sumitomo)

I've been doing satellite and RF work for 6 years and I'm BICSI certified. Happy to travel wherever the work takes me.

My insurance certificate is attached - it's a $2M policy through Progressive, good through November 2027.

Ready to work!

Chris Taylor
Signal Works Inc.
(815) 555-0123
